## Introduction
This package is for project 3 for STAT302. It contains four functions: 
<p>
* my_t.test
* my_lm
* my_knn_cv
* my_rf_cv
</p>
These models analyze data and evaluate statistical models. It also containts a dataset my_gapminder taken from the gapminder package.
<br>
